name: Pearl Kreig

experience.title: Knowledge Engineer
experience.description: Utilized knowledge engineering practices to develop detailed data models for a variety of complex software applications. Applied data mining and knowledge engineering techniques to solve complex business problems. Developed algorithms and software tools to automate the knowledge engineering process.

experience.title: Knowledge Engineer
experience.description: Optimized existing knowledge engineering processes to increase efficiency and accuracy. Collaborated with stakeholders to identify data requirements and develop knowledge engineering solutions. Managed end-to-end life cycles of knowledge engineering projects from requirements gathering to deployment.

education.degree: Master of Science in Knowledge Engineering

summary: Experienced Knowledge Engineer with 5+ years' experience in data mining, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. Proven success in building and deploying AI systems that deliver significant business value.
